forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 46. Southwest wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 55 in the afternoon. North wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
Tonight, Downtown San Francisco stretches out under a blanket of clear skies, the air crisp and inviting with a low settling around 46 degrees. A gentle breeze whispers from the southwest, barely stirring the city’s usual rhythm. As the night deepens, the tranquility offers a moment for reflection, perhaps best enjoyed with a warm drink on a cozy terrace. 

Tomorrow unfolds in sharp contrast; the sun will paint the morning in brilliant hues, promising a sunny day with a high near 58. As the afternoon drifts on, temperatures may mellow to around 55, but the clarity of the day is unmistakable. Light winds from the north will add a refreshing touch, creating the perfect backdrop for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or a quiet visit to one of the city's many charming cafes. Dressing in layers will serve the day well, allowing for a comfortable transition from morning chill to midday warmth. Whether it’s savoring an afternoon tea or lingering in a bookstore, the conditions beckon for thoughtful embrace of the city’s offerings.
